description: Our Justia Team has been fortunate to reopen some of our offices in recent weeks and start hosting in-person events and gatherings! While some Justians continue to work from home, our open offices have welcomed new team members visiting for the first time, as well as familiar faces!
Zoey the Hug Pug is growing up fast! She got to celebrate her very first birthday last month with her pug friends and favorite people too.
